Sentencas: Gadolinium -doped ceria (GDC) is the most widely used buffer layer to prevent the reaction between YSZ electrolyte and La 0.6 Sr 0.4 Co 0.2 Fe 0.8 O
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: 3- delta (LSCF) cathode for commercial solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: However, conductivity and sintering activity are vital to cell performance.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: In this paper, Ca 2+ and F - co -doped GDC (Ca 0.03 Gd 0.17 Ce 0.8 F 0.06 O 1.84- delta , CGDCF) is used as a buffer layer to improve the performance and stability of SOFC.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: The co -doped F - and Ca 2+ significantly improve the sintering properties and oxygen ion transport of traditional GDC material.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the optimized sintering temperature is 1300 degrees C, with the lowest ohmic resistance.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: The peak power density of a cell with a CGDCF buffer layer reaches 1.809 W cm -2 at 850 degrees C, which is 37 % higher than that of GDC.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: In addition, the cell with the CGDCF buffer layer exhibits excellent stability during the 150 h test owing to the lower migration of La and Sr elements.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer

Sentencas: Thus, the Ca 2+ and Fco -doped GDC oxide emerges as a promising material for buffer layer applications.
Titulo: Enhanced performance of solid oxide fuel cells using highly conductive Ca 2+and F- co-doped Gd 0.2 Ce 0.8 O 1.9 buffer layer
